Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: AccessString
properties.description: Access permissions string used for this user account.

type.description: Access permissions string used for this user account.

properties.name: Passwords
properties.description: Passwords used for this user account. You can create up to two passwords for each user.

type.description: Passwords used for this user account. You can create up to two passwords for each user.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Type of authentication strategy for this user.

type.description: Type of authentication strategy for this user.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this user.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this user.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user account.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user account.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Indicates the user status. Can be "active", "modifying" or "deleting".

type.description: Indicates the user status. Can be "active", "modifying" or "deleting".
